casebody.data:
CLEAN AIR COUNCIL, Margaret M. Demarteleire, and Michael S. Bomstein, Petitioners
v.
SUNOCO PIPELINE L.P., Respondent No. 231 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. December 5, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 5th day of December, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
